fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • The Experience column in this week’s pre-printed Weekend magazine omits the name of the subject, Ben Jolliffe, and incorrectly credits his portrait to Amit Lennon, when Jolliffe took the picture. In addition, his story was told to Kyle McNeil, not Chris Broughton (11 April, page 8). • Other recently amended articles include: School closures likely to have little impact on spread of coronavirus, review finds UK schools will not reopen straight after Easter, officials say The Guardian view on Easter week: time to be creative A local’s guide to virtual Venice
